name: DOB_future_check
description: Date of birth cannot be in the future

name: customer_id_null_check
description: Customer ID must not be null
sql: SELECT * FROM {table} WHERE CUS_ID IS NULL

name: life_status_death_date_consistency
description: Deceased customers must have a death date
sql: SELECT * FROM {table} WHERE CUS_LIFE_STATUS = 'DCD' AND CUS_DEATH_DATE IS NULL

name: ni_number_format_check
description: NI number must follow UK format (2 letters + 6 digits + 1 letter)
sql: SELECT * FROM {table} WHERE CUS_NI_NO IS NOT NULL AND NOT REGEXP_CONTAINS(CUS_NI_NO, r'^[A-Z]{2}[0-9]{6}[A-D]$')
